quote_first: She was to leave the reception as soon as she could and return to her room to change clothes. At
quote_last: there’d be another blackout, during which she’d take the outside stairwell to the ground floor and wait at the exit for a Broadmoor’s catering van.
title: The Enclave
author: Karen Hancock

quote_first: The first incendiaries to hit St Thomas’s Hospital had splattered Riddell House at
quote_last: , from where a few hours earlier the Archbishop of Canterbury had given ‘an inspiring address’.
title: The Longest Night
author: Gavin Mortimer
